alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 12:35PM PDT until March 25 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sustained west to northwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts near 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 178 below Walker Pass, including the town of Inyokern and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
